name: [REDACTED] of Goncharov
description:
Time stops for no one... not even when you're on the run from the mafia and living in the middle of nowhere with the love of your life.

Controls:

WASD - Movement
Mouse: Aiming
Left mouse button: Interact
Escape: Options (enable/disable character voice sounds)

Credits:

Direction, design, programming and writing by Nicolás Jaramillo Ortiz

Assets used: (click to expand)
